operator.name: Expert rule generator
operator.help: Generates classification, regression, or survival rules. Classification rules can be induced with a help expert knowledge.

operator.name: Rule generator
operator.help: Generates classification, regression or survival rules.

operator.name: Rule translator
operator.help: Translates rules from RapidMiner to Disesor format.

operator.name: Survival rules evaluator
operator.help: Evaluates survival rules using IBS indicator (Integrated Brier's Score).
